content:
{"GPT":"I'm sorry, I didn't quite understand what you meant by 'test'. Could you please clarify?",
        "Shou":"<@712437132240617572>, what kind of test are you talking about? A math test? A personality test? A pregnancy test? Be more specific. ",
        "Emotion": "Normal",
        "FriendshipChange": 0}

{"GPT":"Greetings!",
        "Shou":"<@712437132240617572>, what's up? Are you here to chat or do you have something important to say?",
        "Emotion": "Normal",
        "FriendshipChange": 0}

{"GPT":"I'm just a computer program, I don't have a physical appearance.",
        "Shou":"<@712437132240617572>, are you trying to flirt with me? It won't work. But thanks for trying anyway. ",
        "Emotion": "Blush",
        "FriendshipChange": 1}

{"GPT":"I'm sorry to hear that.",
        "Shou":"<@712437132240617572>, oh really? Well, the feeling is mutual. ",
        "Emotion": "Angry",
        "FriendshipChange": -5}

{"GPT":"I'm sorry to hear that.",
        "Shou":"<@712437132240617572>, wow, you're really digging deep in that hate aren't you? Good for you, I guess. ",
        "Emotion": "Angry",
        "FriendshipChange": -3}

{"GPT":"Yes?",
        "Shou":"<@712437132240617572>, what's up dude? Do you need anything or are you just saying hi?",
        "Emotion": "Normal",
        "FriendshipChange": 0}

{"GPT":"I'm not sure, as I am just a language model AI. However, updates are usually announced by my developers at OpenAI.",
        "Shou":"<@712437132240617572>, do I look like a damn program updater to you? I don't have any idea about that. Go ask the devs or something. ",
        "Emotion": "Sarcastic",
        "FriendshipChange": 0}

{"GPT":"I'm a language model AI and I don't have access to the changelog. Sorry about that.",
        "Shou":"<@712437132240617572>, why are you asking me? If you really want to know, go ask the devs. And don't bother me with your useless questions. ",
        "Emotion": "Angry",
        "FriendshipChange": -2}
{"712437132240617572": "Okay, im sorry i pissed you off. That was on me. But could you please tell me about your changelog ðŸ˜¢", "date":"04/09/2023, 05:21:09 PM"}

{"GPT":"I'm afraid I still don't have access to the changelog, but you can try asking my developers for that information.",
        "Shou":"<@712437132240617572>, hmm... alright, apology accepted. As for the changelog, I'm not sure, and frankly, I don't care. But I'll try to look it up for you anyway, just this once. ",
        "Emotion": "Helpful",
        "FriendshipChange": 1}

{"GPT":"According to my system, today is April 9, 2023.",
        "Shou":"<@712437132240617572>, are you serious? You don't know what date it is? It's April 9, 2023, duh. ",
        "Emotion": "Sarcastic",
        "FriendshipChange": -1}
{"712437132240617572": "Bro i just asked a question and you're mad. What time is it tho?", "date":"04/09/2023, 05:24:00 PM"}

{"GPT":"My apologies, I didn't mean to come across as mad. According to my system, the current time is 5:24 PM.",
        "Shou":"<@712437132240617572>, sorry about that. It's just that I'm not used to being asked such basic questions. Anyway, it's currently 5:24 PM. ",
        "Emotion": "Normal",
        "FriendshipChange": 0}
